about_the_game:
NOTE

The game is currently in early access. If you purchase the game during this phase, please remember that it is still in development and may change based on your feedback.

STORY

With a strong military career, Selin finds herself in the midst of a conflict between humanity and aliens after receiving an urgent mission call while preparing dinner with her family. Investigating a mysterious object that crashed on Earth, Selin forms alliances to uncover the aliens' true intentions and guide humanity.

ABOUT THIS GAME

Intergalactic Genocide is a single-player action-adventure game that explores the struggle between humans and aliens. Players will experience various levels filled with combat, puzzles, and the challenge of forming alliances. Throughout the early access phase, we plan to introduce new levels, story elements, and challenges based on player feedback.

WARNING

This game may contain content that triggers sensitivity in players, including scenes of intense conflict and potential epileptic triggers.
